 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קְבֹל‎</span>] **noun [masculine]** 

**1.** ==&gt;something in front== specifically an ==attacking-engine== (compare <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***front***; <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, ***advance*** to attack, so <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הקביל‎</span> [[Eccl.12.5|Eccl 12:5]]), [[Ezek.26.9|Ezek 26:9]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְחִי קָֽבֳלּוֺ‎</span> the stroke of his ***attacking-engine*** (on the form <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***‡obolló***</u></abbr>, from <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קְבֹל‎</span> for <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***‡ªbªl***</u></abbr>, see [[BDB#Ol|Ol]]<sup>§ 169</sup> [[BDB#Kö|Kö]]<sup>ii. 68 f.</sup>; and compare <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קָֽטֳנִּי‎</span> from <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קְטֹן‎</span> for <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***‡ª‰ªn***</u></abbr>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קָֽטָבְךָ‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קָֽרֶבְכֶם‎</span>; and on the <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בֳָ‎</span>, [[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:93q»§ 93q</sup>). 

**2.** construct <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קָֽבָלעָֿם‎</span> (<abbr title="transliteration"><u>***‡obol***</u></abbr>) [[2Kgs.15.10|2Kgs 15:10]], explained formerly as ***before*** the people, i.e. publicly (compare Biblical Aramaicaic <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קֳבֵל‎</span> ***before***); but the Aramaic is surprising and <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הָעָם‎</span> needed: read <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כְּיִבְלְעָם‎</span> ***in Ibleam***, with [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] of L (confirming earlier conjectures of [[BDB#Gr|Gr]]<sup>G ii. 1. 99</sup> [[BDB#Sta|Sta]]<sup>Gi. 575</sup>), [[BDB#Dr|Dr]] [[BDB#Klo|Klo]] [[BDB#Benz|Benz]] [[BDB#Kit|Kit]] and others
